steps.name: And there is user Bob in Ethereum network with no initial balance
And user Bob requests the Ether faucet for 10Ξ
When user Alice sends 2Ξ to user Bob
Then the recipient has balance increased by 2Ξ
And the sender has balance decreased by 2Ξ
